DOC.brief_summary: Chronic spontaneous urticaria inflammatory disease characterize intermittent daily urticaria . This diseases last 6 week . Several recent study suggest role vitamin D modulation immune system pathogenesis chronic urticaria .
DOC.brief_title: High Dose Vitamin D Supplementation Chronic Spontaneous Urticaria
DOC.criteria: Uriticaria angioedema daily 3 day week least 6 week Physical urticaria aquired hereditary angioedema Calcium level > 10.3 mg/dl Glomerular filtration rate < 50 Sarcoidosis Primary hyperparathyroidism Granulomatous diseases Malignancies Pregnancy Lactation
